sentence: On stage with Trump on Saturday, Perdue falsely declared that the 2020 election and his own runoff were absolutely stolen!? Moments later, he promised to jail the people responsible? and gave a big thumbs up to the crowd chanting, Lock him up!? referring to Brian Kemp.
author: Patricia Murphy
title: OPINION: Meet the 2022 David Perdue

author: Fox News Staff
title: Chris Christie sends message to Dems: Follow Obama's advice, tell this story to voters

sentence: According to AJC, prior to the 2018 election, nearly 47,000 voter registrations were put in pending status, about 70% of which were from Black residents.? The suit was filed in 2018 by Stacey Abrams group Fair Fight Action after she lost her gubernatorial race to Republican Brian Kemp.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: Georgia voting rights suit heads to trial as midterms heat up in the state

sentence: Abrams, a Democrat, is now turning her sights to the 2022 governor's race after losing the same race in 2018 to Republican Brian Kemp.
